price: Wala hakuwa Mola wako Mlezi wa kuihiliki miji kwa dhulma tu na hali watu wake ni watenda mema.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: Wala sio mwendo wake Mwenyezi Mungu, wala sio uadilifu wake wa maumbile, kuudhulumu umma wowote akauteketeza nao unashikamana na Haki, unafuata mwendo bora, unatenda yanao wafaa wao na wenginewe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna rabbuka liyuh'lika al-qurā biẓul'min wa-ahluhā muṣ'liḥūna
